author: KezMarms
title: 3 week itinerary Dec/ Jan
text: # 1 Hi, I am travelling to India for the first time at the end of December for a 3 week trip (work hasn't allowed me any longer!), i plan to leave on the 26th or 27th or December. My fried who is travelling with me is staying on for two week afterwards so we're trying to plan our trip. Obviously i want to visit a lot of places and fit in my main interests but i'm not sure it's all possible in the 3 weeks i have and i don't want to the trip to be too hectic! Here is what i'm thinking so far, any advice on the trip as a whole, travel or anything i'm missing would be great! Thanks, Kerry Delhi
